long_description: Keep a bag of Peeled Snacks much-ado-about-Mango fruit snacks in your pack for recurring snack cravings. Organic, tropically flavored mangos are thinly sliced and gently dried at peak ripeness. Contains no sulfites, sugar, oil or preservatives.
short_description: Keep a bag of Peeled Snacks much-ado-about-Mango fruit snacks in your pack for recurring snack cravings. Organic, tropically flavored mangos are thinly sliced and gently dried at peak ripeness.
